item.title: K8s ClusterAPI
item.description: What is the CAPI Project about? ClusterAPI is a project focussing on the lifecycle management day0 to day2 in order to ease the management for K8s Clusters. The project explains itself with: The Cluster API is a Kubernetes project to bring declarative, Kubernetes-style APIs to cluster creation, configuration, and management. Get the environment ready In order to leverage all the functionality please make sure youÂ´re using the latest version.
